inventory.commentary: FN contains an entry but it is for the modal verb

sense.name: Get the better of; exceed (an opponent).
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[agent] BEST NP2[patient] (PP) NP1[theme1] BEST [theme2]
sense.examples: John bested Mary in a battle of wits. Stocks bested previous performance. Stock pickers have bested a randomly selected portfolio most months this quarter.
